flawed_nl_solution:
There were 94 + 76 + 89 + 58 = <<94+76+89+58=317>>317 fishes in the tank.
The fish to be sold is 30 + 48 + 17 + 24 = <<30+48+17+24=191>>191.
Therefore, Danny will be left with 317 - 191 = <<317-191=126>>126 fishes.
#### 126

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 119, not 191. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
